name: clickhouse-cargo
description: Accumulates insert queries and commit them to clickhouse in batch jobs with retries on failure. 这个模块将向 Clickhouse 数据库的高频写入改为低频的批量插入。

scripts.test01: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha ./lib/test/01-create-cargo.js -R spec
scripts.test02: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha ./lib/test/02-push-to-cargo.js -R spec
scripts.test03: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha ./lib/test/03-commit-bulk.js -R spec
scripts.test04: export DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha ./lib/test/04-restore-local-bulks.js -R spec
scripts.test: export DISABLED_DEBUG=chcargo*; CLICKHOUSE_CARGO_PROFILE=playground nyc mocha --recursive ./lib/test -R spec

author: Yi
